evidence: A function is a mathematical rule that maps each input from one set, called the domain, to an output in another set, called the range.
Systems work in a similar way. They take an input, process it through interconnected elements, and produce an output.
Our goal is to define these relationships clearly so that we can apply them to engineering and medical imaging problems.
